feed.title: The Conway & Clohessy Tree
feed.subtitle: A family tree of the ancestors and relatives of Thomas Conway [b1900 - d1980] and Bridie Clohessy [b1904 - d1986]

entry.title: A Hannan memoir
entry.content: I received a copy of a memoir written by Thomas Hannan [1874 - 1964], thanks to Hugh Sweeney. Thomas was first-cousin-once-removed to Thomas Conway [1900 - 1980] and his sister Annie was married to Thomas Cusack [1863 - 1925] who was an uncle of Bridie Clohessy [1904 - 1986]. The memoir details Thomas's life growing up in Limerick and Dublin, and he names many of his relatives and where they lived. I have used this information in combination with baptism and land records to find the parents of Bridget Hannan [1830 - 1903] and her aunts, uncles and other relatives. The memoir can be found in the Download section.

entry.title: Added Noonan, Foley and Fitzgerald families
entry.content: Originally I left out part of the tree because I had found a discrepancy between the information I had received on the Cusacks and the records (avilable online) for some of those people. I chose to leave that part of the tree out until I had a better understanding, because it wasn't clear where the diffeences were coming from. I can now add the relevant people to the tree. Thanks to Jerry Russell and Hugh Sweeney for the information.

entry.title: New Year, New People
entry.content: Added James Sullivan, Clothilde Cusack, Agnes Gleeson, Bridie Gleeson, Eily Gleeson, Kathleen Geary, Bridget Ryan, May Ryan, Burdis Redford, Luke Hartigan,

entry.title: Move Along Please, Nothing To See Here (Yet!)
entry.content: The web site has only just been published, so no updates yet, give it some time.
